item.title: [Delta] Adding A Gamble/Random Chest [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:14, topic:387249”]woopz i dident rip this and do you even have proof, your an idiot…

im legit. even though i dident fo the best job[/quote]
If you want me to spoon feed you on how to fix this tutorial here it is:

Replace the method with this:

public static int randomChest() { return chest[(int)(Math.random()*chest.length)]; }

There, the tutorial now works.

@OP: You should extend this tutorial, and make it more interesting, maybe add some dialouges and proper rewards and what not; because at the moment this isn’t a gamble system, it’s just you clicking on a chest and getting items.
Also, delta is good if you know what you are doing

All in all: Decent tutorial.

item.title: [Delta] Adding A Gamble/Random Chest [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Discription - We are going to make it so there will be a Chest Which requires a key and will give you a random reward!
[font=arial][size=12pt]UPDATING ALOT![/size][/font]
Difficulty - 1/10
Knowledge needed - Basic Copy Paste
Files edited - Client.java, Item,Cfg, item.java
NOTE - These are snippets from my server soucre
NOTE - This is my first tutorial please correct me if i do something wrong!
Credits - Clawz Fury, Awsome Man! Nuff Said
Step 1 - open up client.java and search up

public void NewObjects() {
You should see something like this

This is really self explanitory, basicly this void is saying to add a Global object any where in the map
For example:

So you should find something like this. . .

public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(2730, 3382, 6552, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2726, 3382, 409, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3079, 3488, 2417, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3098, 3494, 2466, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3098, 3495, 2465, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3497, 4879, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3487, 4878, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3489, 4877, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3491, 4876, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3493, 4875, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3084, 3495, 4874, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3091, 3506, 409, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3509, 9496, 3831, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2974, 3372, 2783, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3353, 2109, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3352, 2109, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3351, 2091, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3350, 2094, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3349, 2093, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3348, 2097, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3347, 2103, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2940, 3346, 2105, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3029, 3361, 3828, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2991, 3379, 2470, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3024, 3365, 10638, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3096, 3500, 6552, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(3095, 3505, 410, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2900, 2905, 13180, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2740, 5103, 13181, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2900, 2915, 13179, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2900, 2920, 13184, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2760, 2791, 2560, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2760, 2789, 2565, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2760, 2787, 2562, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4717, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4716, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4715, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4714, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4713, 2213, -1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2536, 4712, 2213, -1, 10);

Once you do that add this to below public void NewObjects() {

makeGlobalObject(XCOORD, YCOORD, 2417, 0, 10);
Make Sure You change the xcoord and ycoord to where you want your object to spawn

What this will do is it will spawn the object for you!

Step 2 - Now we need the box to do something… open up client.java again and search

Under that add if(objectID == 2417){ if(playerHasItem(989, 1)) { deleteItem(989, 1); addItem(Item.randomChest(), 1); addItem(4740, misc.random(35)); sM("You search the chest and find some items!"); } else sM("You Need A Crystal Key To Use This Chest!"); }

Lets Translate That For You

If Player Clicked On Object 2417 (Chest)
And if player has item 989 (Key)
Delete Item 989 (Key)
Add a random item from the Array Below
Send Server Message That You Searched The Box For Items with the keys
The (Else) states that else if the person does not have item 989 (Key) Then it will say that you need a key to activate the box.

this will allow the chest to give you something.

Step 3 - Now open up item.java and search for Barrows under that add

[code]public static int chest[] = {0, 1079, 1093, 1127, 2615, 2617, 3478, 3479, 3480, 3481, 3483, 3485, 3486, 3488, 985, 987, 2366, 2368, 4587, 4608, 7158, 6889, 6540};

public static int randomChest()        
{            
	return chest[(int)(Math.random()*chest.length)];        
}[/code]

This is simply a list of item ids that you have a possible chance of getting from the box.
if You cant understand this then please End your RsPs Career

it should look something like this

public static int Barrows[] = {4734,4710,4724,4726,4728,4730,4718,4718,4732,4736,4738,4716,4720,4722,4753,4747,4755,4757,4759,4708,4712,4714,4745,4749,4751,7462,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592,592}; 
    public static int randomBarrows()
    {
        return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)];
    }
public static int chest[] = {0, 1079, 1093, 1127, 2615, 2617, 3478, 3479, 3480, 3481, 3483, 3485, 3486, 3488, 985, 987, 2366, 2368, 4587, 4608, 7158, 6889, 6540};

      public static int chest[] = {0, 1079, 1093, 1127, 2615, 2617, 3478, 3479, 3480, 3481, 3483, 3485, 3486, 3488, 985, 987, 2366, 2368, 4587, 4608, 7158, 6889, 6540};
    
public static int randomChest()        
{            
	return chest[(int)(Math.random()*chest.length)];        
}</blockquote>

these are the items that you will get from the box

Step 4 - Now we have to create the key

Open upclient.java again and search

//attack potion

right under that code add this //crystal key if(((itemUsed == 985) && (otherItem == 987))){ deleteItem(985, getItemSlot(985), 1); deleteItem(987, getItemSlot(987), 1); addItem(989, 1); sM("You Have Created A Crystal Key!"); }

This means that it will delete the item where ever it is in your inventory.
I have explained these codes you should be able to understnad it

this will alow you to create a key when you use a tooth half with a loop half you will get a crystal key.
Save and Compile

This is my first tut please tell me how i can improve this and dont post comments like delta is shit because delta is beast

Read full topic
